name: RI_1_1_21_1_Evidence_of_Record_Entry_Link_Event
title: RI.1.1.21.1 Evidence of Record Entry Link Event (Function)
description: Maintain Evidence of Record Entry Link Event
purpose: Evidence of Record Entry Link Event includes key metadata, ensures health record integrity (and trust) and enables record audit.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#01
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD audit each occurrence when Record Entries are linked to another entry/object (e.g., Record Entries in an external system).

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#02
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the organization where Record Entries are linked.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#03
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the patient who is subject of linked Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#04
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the user linking Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#05
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the system application which linked Record Entries.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#06
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the type of Record Event trigger (i.e., link).

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#07
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture the date and time Record Entries are linked.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#08
statement.requirement: The system SHOULD capture identity of the location (i.e., network address) where Record Entries are linked.

statement.label: RI.1.1.21.1#09
statement.requirement: The system MAY capture the rationale for linking Record Entries.
